tit.j: 京都市西京極総合運動公園
tit.e: Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park
Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park
Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park

sen.j: 京都市西京極総合運動公園（きょうとし にしきょうごく そうごううんどうこうえん）は、京都府京都市右京区にある広域運動公園。
sen.e: Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park is a regional sports park, which is located in Ukyo Ward Kyoto City Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park is a regional sports park, which is located in Ukyo Ward Kyoto City Kyoto Prefecture.
Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park is a regional sports park, which is located in Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: カンマを補足しました。

sen.j: 総面積19.1haの園内には、京都市西京極総合運動公園野球場、京都市西京極総合運動公園陸上競技場兼球技場、京都市西京極総合運動公園補助競技場、京都アクアリーナ（夏期／水泳場・冬期／スケート場）、京都市体育館、アーチェリー場などが設けられている。
sen.e: This 19.1-ha park has Nishikyogoku Baseball Stadium, Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium,Nishi-Kyogoku Athletic Park supplementary field, Kyoto Aquarena (swimming pool in summer/skating rink in winter), Kyoto City Gymnasium and archery ground and other facilities.

This 19.1-ha park includes the Nishikyogoku Baseball Stadium, Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium,Nishi-Kyogoku Athletic Park supplementary field, Kyoto Aquarena (swimming pool in summer/skating rink in winter), Kyoto City Gymnasium and archery ground and other facilities.

This 19.1-ha park includes the Kyoto Nishikyogoku Baseball Stadium, Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium, Kyoto Nishi-Kyogoku Athletic Park supplementary field, Kyoto Aquarena (swimming pool in summer; skating rink in winter), Kyoto City Gymnasium and archery ground and other facilities.

sen.j: 1930年、東宮（昭和天皇）御成婚奉祝記念に京都市運動場として建設された。
sen.e: Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park was constructed as sports field in Kyoto City to celebrate the marriage of Togu (Emperor Showa), in 1930.
Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park was constructed as a sports field in Kyoto City to celebrate the marriage of Togu (Emperor Showa), in 1930.
Kyoto City Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park was constructed as a sports field in Kyoto City to celebrate the marriage of Togu (Emperor Showa), in 1930.
sen.cmt: スペース削除しました。

sen.j: 1988年京都国体開催を機に、1982年から全面改修を進め、1989年に再整備を完了した。
sen.e: Taking advantage of Kyoto Kokutai (National Sports Festival) held in 1988, overall renovation of this park had started in 1982 and its redevelopment was completed in 1989.
Taking advantage of Kyoto Kokutai (National Sports Festival) held in 1988, the overall renovation of this park had started in 1982 and its redevelopment was completed in 1989.
Taking advantage of Kyoto Kokutai (National Sports Festival) held in 1988, the overall renovation of this park had started in 1982 and its redevelopment was completed in 1989.

sen.j: 1995年に、京都パープルサンガ（現･京都サンガF.C.）の日本プロサッカーリーグ昇格に合わせ京都市西京極総合運動公園陸上競技場兼球技場のスタンドを改修した後、サンガのホームスタジアムとしても活用されている。
sen.e: After the stands of Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium was renovated in time for Kyoto Purple Sanga's (present Kyoto Sanga F.C.) promotion to Japan Professional Football League in 1995, this Stadium has been used as Sanga's home stadium.

After the stands of Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium were renovated in time for Kyoto Purple Sanga's (present Kyoto Sanga F.C.) promotion for the Japan Professional Football League in 1995, this Stadium has been used as Sanga's home stadium.

After the stands of Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium were renovated in time for Kyoto Purple Sanga's (present Kyoto Sanga F.C.) promotion for the Japan Professional Football League in 1995, this Stadium has been used as Sanga's home stadium.

sen.j: 京都アクアリーナは1982年の全面改修時に撤去したが、1999年に建設工事に着手、2002年7月に整備を完了した。
sen.e: Although Kyoto Aquarena was removed at the time of overall renovation in 1982, its construction was started in 1999 and completed in July, 2002.
Although Kyoto Aquarena was removed at the time of overall renovation in 1982, its construction was started in 1999 and was completed in July, 2002.
Although Kyoto Aquarena was removed at the time of overall renovation in 1982, its construction was started in 1999 and was completed in July, 2002.
